thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: I used Ticketmaster Resale to offload some Springsteen tickets as I had to travel for work. All very straightforward to use - tickets were sold straight away and I received funds within a couple of weeks. My only word of caution is that you need to upload your tickets from a PC/laptop - it won't work off your iPhone. Otherwise a great service - would use it again.
